entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Native AOT needs a manifest of input assemblies #108036
    10.0.0
  • System.Data.OleDB Error Messages not working on Spanish #108035
  • ILC is hitting a NullReferenceException when processing linker XML from an assembly #108031
  • [PERF] Issues missed by auto-filer #108027
  • Unhandled exception from AcceptCompletionCallback #108026
  • Docs for members in DependencyInjection.Abstractions lack exception information. #108024
    10.0.0
  • createdump fails on RHEL 8/arm64 with "stack smashing detected" #108023
    10.0.0
  • [wasi] AOT broken in llvm 19 #108020
    10.0.0
  • `GetAsync_ServerNeedsAuthAndNoCredential_StatusCodeUnauthorized` got cancelled #108019
  • [8.0] OOM occurs when calling Encoding.UTF8.GetString with a modified LOH threshold #108010
  • Direct P/Invoke does not seem to work when "encapsulated" in a library #108009
  • `dotnet test` shouldn't crash, even if Dispose method is throwing exception during the Finalize method #108008
  • [9.0] Dead lettering in System.Collections.Specialized.Tests #108007
    9.0.0
  • [9.0] Strings differ assert in System.Text.Tests.EncodingExtensionsTests.Convert_Decoder_ReadOnlySpan_IBufferWriter #108005
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Possible deadlock on process exit if GC is in progress #107800
    8.0.x
  • Plan to migrate to zlib-ng #101465
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions on 9/5/2024 6:12:12 PM #107623
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonMarshal.GetRawUtf8PropertyName API #107782
    10.0.0
  • JIT bit test is not recognized for pattern matching syntax #107801
    10.0.0
  • dotnet --info shows "commi: static" in the host section #108004
  • Performance regression with JsonObject creation by +70% #107869
    9.0.0
  • Serializing source-generated nullable init-only properties throws when using RespectNullableAnnotations #107968
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Call native BrotliEncoderMaxCompressedSize method for BrotliEncoder.GetMaxCompressedLength #108043
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Run our CI source-build legs on CentOS Stream 9 #108042
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable codeql on official builds #108041
    needs-area-label
  • Improve OOM kill message #108039
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [PERF] Fix the perf r2rRunType and pgoRunType argument formats for new flow #108038
    area-Infrastructure
  • Number creation without sign propagation #108037
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix typo `ConcatinatedString ` -> `ConcatenatedString` #108033
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • MSFT:53847109 [.NET Core] DTS / UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups returns PrincipalOperationException: Information about the domain could not be retrieved (1212). #108032
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Warn on instrumenting unsupported types for the Fuzzer #108030
    area-Meta, 10.0.0
  • Move init class helpers to managed code #108029
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Address failures for Import_IterationCountLimitExceeded_ThrowsInAllottedTime #108028
    area-System.Security
  • [release/9.0-rc2] [browser] Fix custom icu fingerprinting. #108025
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix typo #108022
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Correct JsonPolymorphicAttribute.TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName documentation spelling #108021
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Remove duplicate code in `DiagnosticsHandler` #108012
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc2' => 'release/9.0' #108006
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 9.0.0
  • JIT: run a late pass of empty try/finally/fault removal #108003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Update area owners for System.Data.SqlClient #108040
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Don't expand virtual calls too early for minopts #108002
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added JsonMarshal.GetRawUtf8PropertyName API and corresponding JsonProperty tests. #107784
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Extend jump tables #107831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix a possible infinite wait for GC completion at process shutdown. #107844
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.11
  • GC test cleanup #107000
    test-enhancement, area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix Random.GetItems breaking change in produced sequence #108017
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #107091
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "Avoid taking lock for empty bucket in ConcurrentDictionary.TryRemove …" #107656
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 8.0.10
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix HashSet copy constructor handling of instances that have fallen back to the randomized hashcode generator. (#107613) #107687
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 8.0.10
  • [browser] Fix custom icu fingerprinting. #108011
    area-System.Globalization
  • [release/9.0] Fix SG nullability annotations for required and init properties. #108013
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Mitigate JsonObject performance regression. #108014
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc2] Fix Random.GetItems breaking change in produced sequence #108018
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix compilation on ARM64 hosts #107921
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.11
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.119, windows: 128.0.6613.120 #107504
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Mitigate JsonObject performance regression. #107944
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • Fix SG nullability annotations for required and init properties. #107985
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc2] Update configure.h.in #107955
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc2] Replace VectorXx.Exp's edge case fallback with scalar processing #107942
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc2' => 'release/9.0' #107928
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • [release/9.0] Remove invalid assert in RSAOpenSsl #107952
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Enable GC double reporting detection #107986
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix reporting illegal instruction exception #107414
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Visit blocks in RPO during LSRA #107927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • [workload] Fix the SDK band version and base the WBT on the sdk flow #107899
    needs-area-label
  • Improve Random{NumberGenerator}.GetItems/String for non-power of 2 choices #107988
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [Profiler] Update GetFunctionInfo2 to have a decent default ClassID #107753
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add missing params to WhenEach overloads #107964
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • JIT: Fix `emitter::emitSplit` to not create zero-sized method fragment #107568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Enumerable.Reverse(TSource[]) #107957
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #107592
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #107591
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [release/9.0] Treat -rtm as stable sdk version band #107997
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, area-Workloads
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Set unwind table kind #107462
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement volatile barrier APIs #107843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement Vector.AddSaturate/SubtractSaturate #107193
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Implement ProcessStartInfo.InheritHandles for Windows #107836
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Allow un-examining in PipeReader.AdvanceTo(...) #107360
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
